channel.title: messages on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in messages on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-23
item.description: Android Messages update handles Apple iMessage reactions properly (2 minute read) Google Messages on Android can now properly display emoji reactions sent from the iPhone’s Messages app.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-06
item.description: WhatsApp now lets you post ephemeral messages that disappear after 7 days (4 minute read) WhatsApp users can now mark messages to disappear after seven days.
